cpl.readme:
Do not install this plugin unless you understand exactly what it does
This experimental plugin provides tools to share tiddlers via URLs, comprising: * The ability to load a group of tiddlers from the browser location hash at startup * Wizard and templates to create URLs from group of tiddlers
cpl.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/share
cpl.name: Share
